feed.title: Fail Until You Win
feed.subtitle: Fail Until You Win - The adventures of two researchers who like to play with stuff and fail all the way to success.

entry.title: Welcome to our blog!
entry.content:
If we had to define ourserlves in a few sentences, we would say the following:

We are VERY busy. We have dozens of ideas every week.

We found out that we were not getting to our pending personal research projects. So, we started a tradition: Every Monday, every week, between 18:00 and 22:00 our schedule is blocked and we only work on what we like to call “fun stuff”.

But what is “fun stuff”? Simple - everything that sparks our curiosity, from dirty hacks (hint - blog post coming soon), through improving our hardware hacking skills by taking on arbitrary projects (hint - another blog post coming soon), to playing CTFs (you know the drill, I won’t repeat myself).

So stay tuned, because this is only the beginning.
entry.summary: If we had to define ourserlves in a few sentences, we would say the following:
